connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-4" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="25" width="640" height="640" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-5" value="API" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rotation=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="50" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-6" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="205" y="130" width="430" height="430" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-7" value="Ktor" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="150" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-8" value="Kafka" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="470" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-9" value="Business logic" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="240" width="190" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-10" value="Postgres" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="305" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-11" value="API mappers" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rotation=-30;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="80" width="110" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-12" value="SLF4J" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="305" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-13" value="Log DTO" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="305" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-14" value="Log DTO mappers" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="365" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-15" value="DB DTO" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="305" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-16" value="DB DTO mappers" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="365" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a8AKwfdoR6Ry882VJvZZ-17" value="Internal DTO<div><br></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="40" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
